Font Awesome icons

The Student Theme Framework also uses Font Awesome v4.1.0 to deliver a whole range of other icons. Here is a full list.

Some examples

Icon Unicode HTML
f1cd <i class="fa fa-life-ring"></i>
f0e9 <i class="fa fa-umbrella"></i>
f013 <i class="fa fa-cog"></i>
f0c4 <i class="fa fa-scissors"></i>
f0f9 <i class="fa fa-ambulance"></i>
